scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test JWT_SECRET=testsecret nyc mocha "tests/**/*.spec.js" --reporter spec --timeout 10000
scripts.test:rest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test JWT_SECRET=testsecret nyc mocha "tests/rest/**/*.spec.js" --reporter spec --timeout 10000
scripts.test:graphql: cross-env NODE_ENV=test JWT_SECRET=testsecret nyc mocha "tests/graphql/**/*.spec.js" --reporter spec --timeout 10000
